    Finding and extracting values and indices Changing vectors and values: Replace, Add/Subtract, Trim, Pad

Padd vector by index

Source: R/invictor.R
padders.Rd

Padd vector by index

Pad vector front

Pad vector rear

Pad vector front + rear

Usage

x %[+% j

x %+]% j

x %[+]% j

Arguments

x

A vector

j

A one, or two element vector. One element: Pad front or rear by j 0s, or, front by floor(j/2) and rear by ceiling(j/2). Two elements: Pad j[1] times the value passed in j[2].

Value

A padded version of x

Examples


x <- rnorm(100)

# Pad front with 10 zeros
x%[+%10
#>   [1]  0.00000000  0.00000000  0.00000000  0.00000000  0.00000000  0.00000000
#>   [7]  0.00000000  0.00000000  0.00000000  0.00000000  0.47526323 -0.03131467
#>  [13] -0.23377494  1.29039307  0.36082614 -0.12307364 -1.12053572 -0.88480445

# Pad front + rear with NA
x%[+]%c(NA,10)

# Pad front + rear of a character vector
"yes"%[+]%c(2,"no")
#> [1] "no"  "yes" "no" 
"yes"%[+]%c(1,"no")
#> [1] "yes" "no" 
"yes"%[+]%c(0,"no")
#> [1] "yes"
